ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Digest Number 1064
ygData.msgSnippet: i m no techie, so i don t know everything bout my comp, and i can t remember everything but... and yes, my comp is a piece of crap - wasn t meant for games =)
ygData.messageBody:
i'm no techie, so i don't know everything bout my comp, and i can't remember
everything but...

and yes, my comp is a piece of crap - wasn't meant for games =)

>Computer Specs for Bards
>
>CPU: amd-k6 3d processor
>RAM: 60mb
>Video Card (and RAM): voodoo 3 2000
>Video Resolution:
>Sound Card:
>HD speed (rpm): 333
>'Net speed: anywhere from 36-48
>Geographic Location: central vancouver island, bc, canada
>Options enabled or disabled:
> Sky texturing: single layer
> Particle Effects: off, i think
> Mip Mapping: off
>Clip plane distance: 50% (haven't changed anything from when i had a crap
ass vid card)
>
>How many songs can you twist? 2 on a bad day, 3 usually
>Do you slow down when it rains? nope
>How about in Unrest or Kunark? again, 2-3, though haven't been to kunark
with bard yet

lynnara starspinner
eci
